itemDescription: British long jumper, hurdler and pentathlete

wikipedia_page.main: Myra Nimmo (born 5 January 1954) is a Scottish athlete and academic, who currently works at the University of Birmingham. As an athlete, she competed at the 1974 British Commonwealth Games and 1976 Summer Olympics in the long jump, and was the Scottish long jump record holder from 1973 until 2012. From 2016 until 2021, she was the Chair of England Athletics.
